name: Super Mario.exe Reborn
storyline: Dario was a 10-year-old boy who suffered from bullying at school. He liked to play Super Mario All-Stars a lot because thanks to that game, his problems disappeared from his thoughts. But unfortunately he died after being hospitalized because 3 bullies pushed him down the stairs until he fell unconscious. The story continues 20 years later with Luis, Pablo and Juan (The Three Bullies) who were celebrating Luis's birthday. For his birthday, Pablo gave him a Super Mario All-Stars cartridge that came from a flea market organized by Dario's parents. Then they ran to Luis' house to try that game because they loved the Super Mario franchise since they were children
summary:
Super Mario.exe: REBORN is the official remake of "Super Mario.exe" by
AlbertGames_TV (formerly 2002abcdario), which aims to improve the original game in all aspects.
